General.Name: Ari Real Estate Arena Investment Ltd
General.Description: Ari Real Estate (Arena) Investment Ltd engages in the commercial centers and real estate asset activities in Israel and Kazakhstan. It is involved in initiating, establishing, purchasing, renting, managing, and maintaining malls and shopping centers; providing management services to the tenants of commercial units in shopping centers and malls; and holding of other real estate assets. The company was formerly known as Arena Star Group Ltd. Ari Real Estate (Arena) Investment Ltd was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
